Class RestPerson

java.lang.Object
fr.SafetyNet.SafetyNetAlerts.controller.RestPerson
@RestController public class RestPerson extends Object
Rest controller for managing Person entities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RestPerson(PersonService personService)
    Constructs a new RestPerson with the specified PersonService.

  • Constructor Details

    • RestPerson

      public RestPerson(PersonService personService)
      Constructs a new RestPerson with the specified PersonService.
      Parameters:
      personService - the service to manage persons

  • Method Details

    • readAll

      @GetMapping("/person") public List<Person> readAll()
      Retrieves all persons.
      Returns:
      a list of all persons

    • readById

      @GetMapping("person/{firstName}.{lastName}") public Person readById(@PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName)
      Retrieves a person by their first and last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the person
      lastName - the last name of the person
      Returns:
      the person with the specified first and last name

    • create

      @PostMapping("/person") public Person create(@RequestBody Person person)
      Creates a new person.
      Parameters:
      person - the person to create
      Returns:
      the created person

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/person/{firstName}.{lastName}") public String delete(@PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName)
      Deletes a person by their first and last name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the person
      lastName - the last name of the person
      Returns:
      a message indicating the person was deleted

    • update

      @PutMapping("/person/{firstName}.{lastName}") public Person update(@RequestBody Person updatedPerson, @PathVariable String firstName, @PathVariable String lastName)
      Updates an existing person.
      Parameters:
      updatedPerson - the updated person data
      firstName - the first name of the person
      lastName - the last name of the person
      Returns:
      the updated person
